overview.en: Clever DeFi (CLVA) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Clever DeFi has a current supply of 566,745.34121728 with 565,686.76705522 in circulation. The last known price of Clever DeFi is 4.86884026 USD and is up 6.69 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 4 active market(s) with $50,543.23 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://clva.com.
